room_title: Escape room "Art of the Heist" by Amaze Escape in Boston
room_description: Your group of professional thieves has been hired by an international crime syndicate to recover a priceless suitcase. Intelligence has indicated the suitcase was confiscated by the police during a raid. The syndicate has created a diversion to give your team a 60-minute window to break into the locked down police station and recover the suitcase before the police return. Donâ€™t get caught!
